title: Japan’s Katayama Calls for Market Calm After Bond Selloff
description: Japanese Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama called on market participants to calm down after an intense day of bond selling pushed up long-term government debt yields to the highest levels in decades with ripples reaching other global markets.
